backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with storage, authorization mixins, and extensive types for user profiles, contributions, rewards, and U.S. geography data.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading stored contribution data by adding centralized reward values and an awarded-contributions map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report listing frontend files and components involved in logging contribution events and refreshing contribution summaries.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing many frontend files, hooks, components, and documents in the project.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture overview detailing Whisper’s hierarchical installation model, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/COMPLAINT_CATEGORY_SUGGEST: Developer specification for the complaint category suggestion system including backend storage and location-based mappings.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites, configuration, and steps for deploying Whisper on ICP.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes documenting visual and UX updates to the homepage including hero section, contrast fixes, and typography changes.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines phased development of Whisper from foundational architecture to single‑installation prototype and future multi‑installation support, with deliverables, hooks, and non‑goals.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Describes the registry system for Secretary navigation, enabling destinations to register for option buttons, keyword routing, and deep links.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Provides a full manual smoke test for proposal creation, moderation, issue reporting, task management, and regression checks across UI flows.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_REGRESSION_PATC: Defines regression‑focused smoke tests covering logo rendering, styling fixes, profile loading, navigation, Secretary flows, and base‑path deployment.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_SECRETARY_FLOWS: Details smoke tests for all Secretary assistant flows including discovery, issue reporting, custom categories, keyword and deep‑link navigation, and recovery states.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Specifies Whisper’s visual design principles, color palette, typography, and accessibility guidelines for consistent civic‑themed styling.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend CSS.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining app root containers and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: SVG asset containing the teal Whisper logo with circular emblem and white icon elements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing routing, secretary navigation, lazy-loaded pages, and React Query setup.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Responsive header with navigation, authentication-aware menus, and path-based active state handling.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Styled circular icon container supporting size and variant customization.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Reusable spinner with optional label and size variants for consistent loading UI.
frontend/src/components/common/LoginButt: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow, loading states, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/common/UserProfi: User dropdown showing profile info, avatar, navigation to profile, and logout action.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form card for creating instance proposals, including geography selectors, name validation, and submission logic.
County selector tied to selected state, fetching county data and handling loading and errors.
Dropdown for selecting a place within a county, loading places via hook and handling errors or missing county.
Dropdown for selecting a US state, loading list via hook and displaying errors or disabled states.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing issue project details with tabs for overview and tasks, including category and status info.
Task management tab allowing creation and completion toggling of tasks for an issue project.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog displaying detailed proposal info, fetching live data and optionally opening associated issue project details.
Section listing all proposals with loading, error, and empty states, and supporting navigation to detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: UI card prompting users to open secretary features, with dismiss and open actions.
A searchable typeahead input component with keyboard navigation and dropdown filtering for selecting geographic options.
Main secretary chat widget integrating FlowEngineBrain, geography lookups, suggestions, and message handling with auto-scrolling and input controls.
Creates and mounts a portal container for rendering the SecretaryWidget into a dedicated DOM overlay root.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Fetches and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContributionL: Loads paginated admin contribution logs via the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUserContribut: Fetches contribution logs for a specific user principal through admin APIs with validation and pagination.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerContribution: Retrieves the current caller’s contribution summary keyed to their principal using React Query.
Gets and saves the caller’s user profile with identity-scoped caching and mutation-based invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplaintSuggestio: Provides complaint category suggestions and full category lists per hierarchy level using backend geography methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributionEventL: Wraps logContributionEvent with duplicate handling, error normalization, and automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Provides hooks to check instance-name availability and submit validated instance proposals, handling errors, caching, and contribution logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPath.ts: Tracks the current SPA route path by listening to popstate events for navigation updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Debounces a value by a delay, updating only after inactivity to prevent rapid updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProposal.ts: Adds a mutation for deleting proposals and invalidates moderation and proposal caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useHideProposal.ts: Adds a mutation for hiding proposals and refreshes moderation and proposal data after completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and managing login, logout, and status.
Provides hooks to fetch tasks, create new tasks with optimistic updates and logging, and update task completion state with rollback support.
Stores state in localStorage with SSR guards, syncing changes automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useModerationItems.ts: Fetches and maps backend moderation queue proposals into UI-ready moderation items with loading control.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Preloads an image URL and exposes ready/error state, resetting when the source changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, proposals, admin status, issues, and geographic entities via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages secretary chat state including messages, menu visibility, and reset helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Provides a registry for navigation destinations with keyword lookup, registration, and execution actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetIssueProjectCat: Implements temporary client‑side storage for proposal category assignment with React Query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook for approving or rejecting proposals with validation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React Query hooks for fetching states, counties, and places with robust empty/error handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark themes, utility classes, and layout styling.
frontend/src/lib/contributionActionTypes: Defines canonical contribution action type constants aligned with backend enums.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Helpers to format proposal geography data including level labels, population formatting, and display strings.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines Secretary navigation options, keyword matching, and deep‑link creation/parsing utilities.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryReportIssueDat: Fetches geography info and top issues from the backend with fallback messages and combined reporting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryTopIssuesMessa: Provides formatted top‑issues messages for states, counties, and cities using backend lookups with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/uiCopy.ts: Centralized UI text strings for navigation, proposals, authentication, and other interface sections.
frontend/src/lib/whisperInstanceNaming.t: Generates, validates, and parses WHISPER‑prefixed instance names based on geography level.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminModeration: Admin page that checks authentication/admin status and displays moderation items along with contribution logs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Cont: Admin UI to view global or user-specific contribution logs with pagination, search, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Mode: Renders a table of moderation items with status badges, category icons, and actions like approve, reject, hide, or delete.
frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Renders a placeholder geography page with static UI and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits user profile data including name and image with backend persistence and authentication checks.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/FlowEngineB: Implements the flow-engine-based SecretaryBrain, managing context, intents, slots, geography data, and flow navigation.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/hooks.ts: Utility helpers for composing and filtering flow event listeners, including no-op and console loggers.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/SecretaryBr: Defines the SecretaryBrain interface with methods for handling input, actions, context, listeners, and typeahead.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryCop: Static English copy for secretary flows covering menus, discovery, issue reporting, slot prompts, and navigation.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryPro: Provides small helper functions to build formatted prompts and messages for Secretary flows, including issues lists, slot prompts, and discovery messages.
frontend/src/secretary/decisions/secreta: Implements pure decision logic for branching in the Secretary flow, such as selecting next nodes, handling unknown input, and determining geography or instance presence.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/flows.ts: Defines all conversational nodes and their UI models for the Secretary system, including menus, discovery steps, and issue-reporting flows.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/runner.ts: Controls flow execution by handling actions, transitioning between nodes, emitting events, and generating view models based on node definitions.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/types.ts: Declares core types for nodes, transitions, actions, context, and view models used across the Secretary flow engine.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRegist: Maps intents to their required and optional slots, defines slot order, and provides registry and navigation handler utilities.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRunner: Manages slot filling for intents, determining missing slots, generating slot prompts, updating slot bags, and executing intent completion actions.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/geographyL: Fetches states, counties, and places from the backend and performs free-text geography matching, returning the most specific match.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/geographyN: Provides deterministic client-side text matching utilities to identify states, counties, and places from free text.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/index.ts: Barrel module exporting all intent, slot, repair, and geography lookup utilities.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/intentClas: Rule-based intent classifier mapping normalized user text to predefined intents.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/repair.ts: Detects repair-like messages and identifies which slot to correct, then clears slots accordingly.
Manages slot state including getting, setting, clearing, and handling dependent slot resets.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/types.ts: Defines intent, slot, slot bag, and context-related TypeScript types for the Secretary system.
frontend/src/secretary/observability/sec: Lightweight tracing utility storing recent internal events for debugging.
frontend/src/secretary/state/secretaryCo: Manages the Secretary conversation context including initialization, resets, and message handling.
frontend/src/secretary/ui/secretaryViewM: Transforms flow node view models into UI-ready structures and exposes icon name mapping.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Resolves asset and navigation URLs using the app’s base path to ensure correct linking.
frontend/src/utils/secretaryProjectNavig: Implements event-based navigation signaling between Secretary and the project UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, store them in sessionStorage, retrieve them, and clear them, supporting both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps backend error messages to concise user-friendly messages for authorization, geography lookup, proposal, task, and connectivity errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current phase, architecture notes, known issues, and lists existing and pending feature requests for contribution rewards and logging.
